title: Font from pag.76 of the book "In the Cage: A guide to Sigil", from 1995
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724112939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font22_pag_4764.76.jpg)
  
Maybe this can help the identification: The source is at pag.76 of this old 1995 Planescape  
 [manual](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724112939/http:/www.scribd.com/doc/117655597/Planescape-D-D-2nd-In-the-Cage-A-Guide-to-Sigil-OCR)

Font: 

 Jagged Regular

 [WhatFontis](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724112939/http:/typophile.com/user/60072 "View user profile.")
author: Paolo G
